tool.name: Summarize DANTE_LTR output
tool.command: dante_ltr_summary -g '$input1' -o output && ls -l && cp output.html $output1 && mkdir -p ${output1.extra_files_path} && cp -r output_plots ${output1.extra_files_path}/
tool.help: This tool takes GFF3 output from DANTE_LTR and make graphical summary of the results.
